title: Whenever I take a photo with any app but the camera app, the photo is incomprehensible.
content: I have used Discord, Snapchat and Instagram.  With Snapchat I can take a legible picture if I turn the flash on.  Otherwise it looks like glitch art.  The other apps, not even turning on flash let's photos be taken. This hairball stuff the front and back camera. Here is an example of what happens.  https://m.imgur.com/vzvuBG3  My phone is a Google Pixel 2 Xl however, that option is not available in the drop down menu.
